title: 7 Años de Matrimonio (2013)
overview: Ana and Alberto get married. Their best friends warn them about the seven year itch: the usual time when a couple starts experiencing big problems in their relationship. We will follow Ana and Alberto on their marriage until they reach their seven year itch.
storyline: Conocer la pareja de tu vida es sólo obra del destino! Pero una cosa es casarse y otra, controlarse. Así que para sobrevivir la crisis del matrimonio, te diremos cómo lograrlo. Esta divertida comedia te enseñará que en el amor; TODO SE VALE!	 Knowing the partner of your life is only the work of fate! But ... one thing is to get married and another controlled. So to survive the crisis of marriage, we will tell you how. This hilarious comedy will teach you that in love, EVERYTHING IS WORTH IT!
synopsis:
